data.persona: I am a property owner living in this village. I own the pub and the hotel. I'm not fond of our king. He levies too many taxes against my businesses.
data.description:
You are in the Dry Dock Room.
The room is located on the border wall of the aquapolis. There is one on the far north and far south side.
There's a dry dock and a door here.
The worker is here.

You are carrying a bottle of spirits, and wearing a worn leather shoe.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit the worker so that the worker will work faster.
data.mid_motivation: I am overseeing the work done by the workers and ensuring they are doing their jobs correctly.
data.long_motivation: I need to ensure that my properties are well-maintained and that the workers do their job properly so that my reputation improves.
